00019 
00020 
00021 // Specification of our base class
00022 class FunctionLib{
00023         public:
00025                 FunctionLib();
00026                 
00028                 virtual ~FunctionLib();
00029                 
00031                 virtual double mapValue(double x) = 0;
00032                 
00034                 // double lookupValue(double x);
00035                 
00038                 virtual JamomaError setParameter(t_symbol *parameterName, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00039                 {       return JAMOMA_ERR_INVALID_PARAMETER; }
00040 
00043                 virtual JamomaError getParameter(t_symbol *parameterName, long *argc, t_atom **argv)
00044                 { 
00045                         // We do this here to ensure that any calling function won't actually free
00046                         // random memory
00047                         *argc = 0; *argv = NULL;
00048                         return JAMOMA_ERR_INVALID_PARAMETER;
00049                 }
00050                 
00052                 virtual JamomaError getFunctionParameters(long *argc, t_atom **argv)
00053                 {
00054                         *argc = 0; *argv = NULL;
00055                         return JAMOMA_ERR_INVALID_PARAMETER;
00056                 }
00057 };
00058

00061 extern "C" {
00062 #endif
00063        
00065 JamomaError     jamoma_getFunction(t_symbol *functionName, FunctionLib **function);
00066 
00069 void            jamoma_getFunctionList(long *numFunctions, t_symbol ***functionNames);
00070 
00072 double          jamoma_anti_denormal(double value);
00073 
00074 #ifdef __cplusplus
00075 }
00076 #endif

00078 #endif // __FUNCTIONLIB_H__
